wands.name: Ace of Wands
wands.reversed: An emerging idea, lack of direction, distractions, delays

wands.name: Two of Wands
wands.reversed: Personal goals, inner alignment, fear of unknown, lack of planning

wands.name: Three of Wands
wands.reversed: Playing small, lack of foresight, unexpected delays

wands.name: Four of Wands
wands.reversed: Personal celebration, inner harmony, conflict with others, transition

wands.name: Five of Wands
wands.reversed: Inner conflict, conflict avoidance, increased focus on goals

wands.name: Six of Wands
wands.reversed: Private achievement, personal definition of success, fall from grace, egotism

wands.name: Seven of Wands
wands.reversed: Exhaustion, giving up, overwhelmed, overly protective

wands.name: Eight of Wands
wands.upright: Movement, fast paced change, action, alignment, air travel
wands.reversed: Delays, frustration, resisting change, internal alignment

wands.name: Nine of Wands
wands.upright: Resilience, courage, persistence, test of faith, boundaries

wands.name: Ten of Wands
wands.upright: Burden, extra responsibility, hard work, completion
wands.reversed: Doing it all, carrying the burden, delegation, release

wands.name: Page of Wands
wands.upright: Inspiration, ideas, discovery, limitless potential, free spirit
wands.reversed: Newly formed ideas, redirecting energy, self-limiting beliefs, a spiritual path

wands.name: Knight of Wands
wands.upright: Energy, passion, inspired action, adventure, impulsiveness
wands.reversed: Passion project, haste, scattered energy, delays, frustration

wands.name: Queen of Wands
wands.upright: Courage, confidence, independence, social butterfly, determination
wands.reversed: Self-respect, self-confidence, introverted, re-establish sense of self
